strings.Value: "I just want to say, you've been a loyal companion, Ekun. It's good to have someone to rely on in such a dark hour."
"It's time to go. Are you ready?"
{n}Ekun nods to you briefly. You feel energy and determination in his movements.{/n} "The curse didn't break you. Good. But we must hurry. This madness must be stopped, once and for all."

{n}Ekun's face, usually still, brightens with gratitude. He clasps his hand to his heart.{/n} "Words of a worthy leader are a better reward than honors and gold. We've come a long way. May the ones ahead be longer and lighter."
"No. We are going to fight for our home, for the laughter of children yet to be born. That evil outsider god fights only for his pride. He cannot win."
